analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#230-231) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#244-250)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#258-264)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#270-276)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#281-291)

TitanToken.exchangeTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol)

TitanToken.MAXIMUM_ICO_TOKENS should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#436-437)
TitanToken.MAX_BOUNTY_ALLOCATED_TOKENS should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#438-439)
TitanToken.OWNERS_ALLOCATED_TOKENS should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#439-440)
TitanToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#426-430)
TitanToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#425-426)
TitanToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#426)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/15/0x69a53cb980eb6b08a9a13017faac550732d173c6.sol#1): it allows old versions
